catalogitems.name: Lettuce
catalogitems.description: Crisp and refreshing, our lettuce leaves are perfect for salads, wraps, and sandwiches. With their delicate texture and mild flavor, they provide a crunchy base for your favorite toppings and dressings.

catalogitems.name: Arugula
catalogitems.description: Peppery and vibrant, our arugula adds a bold kick to any dish. Use it as a flavorful bed for grilled meats, toss it into pasta dishes for added depth, or simply enjoy it dressed with olive oil and lemon for a refreshing salad.

catalogitems.name: Dill
catalogitems.description: Fragrant and aromatic, our dill adds a burst of freshness to your culinary creations. Sprinkle it over seafood dishes, mix it into creamy dips and sauces, or use it to flavor pickles for a tangy twist.

catalogitems.name: Parsley
catalogitems.description: Bright and herbaceous, our parsley is a versatile staple in any kitchen. Use it to garnish soups and stews, chop it into salads for a burst of freshness, or blend it into pesto for a vibrant sauce.

catalogitems.name: Shiso
catalogitems.description: Vibrant and flavorful, our shiso leaves add a unique twist to your meals. Roll them into sushi rolls, chiffonade them over noodles, or use them to wrap savory fillings for a Japanese-inspired appetizer.

catalogitems.name: Spinach
catalogitems.description: Nutrient-rich and tender, our spinach is a versatile green that can be enjoyed raw or cooked. Add it to smoothies for a healthy boost, saut√© it with garlic and olive oil as a side dish, or use it as a base for hearty salads.
